meta_pref_boolean.helpText: At startup, do you want the information collecting agent to act as a web crawler, by periodically following hyperlinks to download more documents?
At startup, do you want the information collecting agent to download the images from the web pages it processes?

meta_pref_float.helpText:
The hot space is the composition area that you share with the program. The cool space is exclusively yours to work with.

This parameter defines the proportion of the whole information space that is dedicated as the cool space, at startup time.

meta_pref_boolean.description: Composition agent automatically clusters related elements?
meta_pref_boolean.helpText: Use the visual composition that automatically clusters related elements into piles. You may wish to move elements around, and sometimes, to re-cluster.
Use the in-context slider to enable fine-grained expression of interest in metadata fields and individual words.
Use the seeding dashboard to dynamically filter searches and other seeds.

meta_pref_float.description: Density: Visible elements per square inch [.1,20]
meta_pref_float.helpText:
Controls how many elements will appear in the information space, relative to the area of the space. The default value is .5 elements per square inch.

This lets you decide how many total elements the program will place into the space. Doubling this number, will double the number of elements.

meta_pref_int.helpText: The number of steps backwards you can go, by using undo, or the reverse button.

meta_pref_boolean.helpText: Shows or hides extra buttons that can be used for debugging the javascript. Allows direct access to cookies & arrays
